events.text:
The whole town loves my Bluescale salmon cuisine, but I am much more than a fish dish!
I have another dish: Spider Stew, that involves a taboo ingredient... spider eyes.
Hear me out! It sounds kooky, and maybe a bit spooky, but the spider eyes have a nice savory texture that makes my recipe all the buzz!
There are a bunch of those polyleg'ed critters southwest of here. Bring me about 7 of their eyes and 5 wild mushrooms around that area.
Do you have those spider eyes and mushrooms yet?
Splendid! Those eyes sure look delicious! Let me get my cauldron and my secret spices and fix you some Spider Stew for your troubles... here ya go!
